thread.title: EAG Services, Inc. Awarded Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Company, and Best Place To Work by Houston Business Journal
thread.title_full: EAG Services, Inc. Awarded Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Company, and Best Place To Work by Houston Business Journal

author: Debra Grooms
title: EAG Services, Inc. Awarded Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Company, and Best Place To Work by Houston Business Journal
text:
EAG Services Inc., a trusted, independent business and technology advisor to the energy industry, today announced placing on the 2015 Inc. 5000 list. Inc. Magazine ranks the nation’s fastest growing private companies annually, and EAG Services, Inc. is number 3142 on this year’s list. Companies on this list make up the most important segment of the economy – America’s entrepreneurs. Past alumni include Under Armor, Microsoft, Patagonia, Oracle, GoPro and Timberland. “We are honored to be recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest growing private service providers in America. This award, along with other industry awards, is a welcome reminder of the value we bring to our clients across the country,” said Elizabeth A. Gerbel, founder and CEO of EAG Services, Inc. “Our commitment to our customer’s success has been the foundation for our growth. We are dedicated to delivering high quality service to the energy industry.”
The 2015 Inc. 5000, unveiled online at Inc.com and with the top 500 companies featured in the September issue of Inc. is the most competitive crop in the list’s history. The average company on the list achieved a mind-boggling three-year growth of 490 percent. The Inc. 5000’s aggregate revenue is $205 billion, generating 647,000 jobs over the past three years. Complete results of the Inc. 5000, including company profiles and an interactive database that can be sorted by industry, region, and other criteria, can be found at http://www.inc.com/inc5000 .
In addition to being honored by Inc. Magazine, EAG Services, Inc. was also awarded one of the Best Places To Work by the Houston Business Journal. Survey company Quantum Workplace compiles the list annually based on employees’ thoughts about their corporate culture, amenities, benefits, and worker attraction and retention strategies. CEO Elizabeth A. Gerbel and employees were honored at a luncheon on Thursday, October 8th, at the Hyatt Regency in downtown Houston, Texas.
EAG Services, Inc. a trusted, independent business and technology advisor to the energy industry. EAG Services was founded by Elizabeth A. Gerbel in June of 2003. By staying focused on specific segments of the energy industry and remaining unbiased in our approach, EAG Services, Inc. delivers solutions that fit your business while providing a challenging and rewarding place to work for our employees. We partner with our clients to provide the industry, application, and business process expertise needed to lead your most challenging initiatives. Emphasizing the need to find and implement the “right” solutions for our clients ensures their success, and therefore our own.
